sentences.en: They have imprisoned an innocent man.
sentences.cn: 他们监禁了一名无辜的男子。

sentences.en: The government imprisoned dissidents, forbade travel, and restricted the press.
sentences.cn: 政府关押了持不同政见者，禁止了出游，限制了新闻自由。

sentences.en: The criminal justice system is in need of urgent reform to prevent more people being wrongfully imprisoned.
sentences.cn: 刑事司法体制急需改革,以防更多的人被不公正地监禁。
